name: NATIONAL POTATO COUNCIL
sampleDescriptions:
Implementation of the Agriculture Act of 2014 (H.R. 2642). 

Regulatory Activities related to pollinators; the White House Task Force on Pollinators. 

Potato participation in nutrition program. 

Hou

NIFA Special Grants Potato Breeding research

Funding for Market Access Program and Technical Assistance for Specialty Crops 

Maintain authorized budget levels for Farm Bill

H-2A Guest Worker program implementation. 

Immigration reform for agriculture.

Implementation of S. 764 GMO labeling disclosure bill. 

Implementation of Food Safety Modernization Act.
